info.name: Restrict login to IP addresses
info.summary: Allows administrators to restrict logins to their instance to specific IP ranges.
info.description:
This app allows administrators to restrict login to their Nextcloud server to specific IP ranges. Note that existing sessions will be kept open.
The allowed IP ranges can be administrated using the OCC command line interface or graphical using the admin settings. If you plan to use the OCC tool, the following commands would be applicable.
To whitelist `127.0.0.0/24`:
- `occ config:app:set limit_login_to_ip whitelisted.ranges --value 127.0.0.0/24`
To whitelist `127.0.0.0/24` and also `192.168.0.0/24`:
- `occ config:app:set limit_login_to_ip whitelisted.ranges --value 127.0.0.0/24,192.168.0.0/24`
